overlap.pro

NAME: overlap PURPOSE: generate list of overlapping grid spaxels & percent overlap given a particular box with corners EXPLANATION: CALLING SEQUENCE INPUTS: ;cube - cube for overlap;assuming 1 arcsec square grid corners - corners of slit formated from cornersbox.pro OUTPUT: list of spaxels & cooresponding overlap percentage/weight list[0,*] = [x,y,percent] METHOD: REVISION HISTORY: 10Nov26 Jeff Rich created

slitcens.pro

NAME: slitcens PURPOSE: Part of script for generating pseudo-images from ifu cubes Given a cube, slit element length, PA, xcen and ycen Generates an array of x & y values for centers of slit elements EXPLANATION: CALLING SEQUENCE INPUTS: cube - WiFeS data cube d - slit element length ang-slit angle clockwise from up (w of n if PA=0) xcen ycen OUTPUT: array of slit center locations METHOD: REVISION HISTORY: 10Nov25 Jeff Rich created
